item.title: First Endowed Deanship at RPI Honors Alumnus’ Formative Student Experience
item.description: TROY, N.Y. — Thomas R. Farino Jr. ‘67 and his wife Patricia Farino have made a $5 million gift to Rensselaer’s School of Engineering to establish the university’s first endowed deanship. Their gift marks another milestone in RPI’s yearlong Bicentennial celebration of the Institute’s past, present, and future.

item.title: DotCIO Schedules Server Upgrades for December 21, 22
item.description: DotCIO will be performing necessary server upgrades over the winter break. From midnight through 11:59pm on Saturday, December 21, an update to IACSDept.win.rpi.edu will affect S drive for campus and V drive for departments. An update to IACSHome.win.rpi.edu from 9:00am to 1:00pm on Sunday, December 22 will affect all U drives (home directories).

item.title: “Developing Your Leadership Presence” Topic of HR Professional Development Seminar
item.description:
Description: Scheduled to be held from 8:00AM to noon on Wednesday, January 15, 2025, this seminar is designed to help leaders improve their ability to authentically influence and connect with others. Discussion topics include the relationship between personal presence and ability to influence people and situations, a recognition of how specific behaviors increase or decrease an influential presence and steps to authentically interact with others in a more influential manner.
